name: Baka Game Bot
description: A Telegram bot with Economy, Kill, Rob and Protection systems using MongoDB.

OWNER_ID.description: Telegram user ID of the bot owner (integer, no @).

SUDO_IDS.description: Comma-separated Telegram user IDs for sudo users (e.g. "12345,67890"). Leave empty if none.

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Link to your Telegram support group (e.g. https://t.me/YourSupportGroup).

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Link to your Telegram updates channel (e.g. https://t.me/YourUpdateChannel).

OWNER_LINK.description: Link to the owner contact (e.g. https://t.me/YourOwnerUsername).
